channel.title: Python on Andreas Beger
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Andreas Beger

item.title: Time to learn Python
item.description: Apparently Python is taking over the world (from a post by Tal Yarkoni): In 2013, my toolbox looks like this: Python for text processing and miscellaneous scripting; Ruby on Rails/JavaScript for web development, except for an occasional date with Django or Flask (Python frameworks); Python (NumPy/SciPy) for numerical computing; Python (Neurosynth, NiPy etc.) for neuroimaging data analysis; Python (NumPy/SciPy/pandas/statsmodels) for statistical analysis; Python (MatPlotLib) for plotting and visualization, except for web-based visualizations (JavaScript/d3.
